Package com.prc.alp.liaison.admin

Provides utility support for the administration of ALP/Cougaar liaisons with external agents through a JavaSpace-based interface.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LiaisonTrigger An interface designed to allow a customized response to JavaSpace events related to liaison administration.
 

Class Summary
AgentReference Describes a generic agent as an entry suitable for reading from or writing to a JavaSpace.
ALPAgentReference Describes an ALP/Cougaar agent as an entry suitable for reading from or writing to a JavaSpace.
ExternalAgentReference Describes an external agent (not in an ALP/Cougaar society) as an entry suitable for reading from or writing to a JavaSpace.
LiaisonSpace A class that simplifies the use of JavaSpace services.
LiaisonSpaceAdapter A class that extends LiaisonSpace to provide support for listening and responding to JavaSpace events.
LiaisonSpaceListener An RMI-accessible class that implements RemoteEventListener to provide support for listening and responding to JavaSpace events through a separate thread.
LiaisonStatusReference Describes the status of liaisons between an ALP/Cougaar agent and an external agent as an entry suitable for reading from or writing to a JavaSpace.
NamedServiceFinder A class that implements the methods needed locate a service with a given name in a Jini(tm) Lookup service.
 

Package com.prc.alp.liaison.admin Description

Provides utility support for the administration of ALP/Cougaar liaisons with external agents through a JavaSpace-based interface. The included classes and interfaces are primarily low-level utilities for describing agents and liaisons, or for simplifying the passing of information through a JavaSpace.
